vulnerability_findings.message:

	- ERC20Token.allowance (function @ MintableERC20Token.sol#372-378)
	- IERC20Token.allowance (function @ MintableERC20Token.sol#227-230)

	- MintableERC20Token.sol#39-41

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function StandardError(string memory message) internal pure returns (bytes memory) {

        return abi.encodeWithSelector(STANDARD_ERROR_SELECTOR, bytes(message));
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'LibRichErrors.StandardError' (MintableERC20Token.sol#32-34) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function Uint256BinOpError(BinOpErrorCodes errorCode, uint256 a, uint256 b) internal pure returns (bytes memory) {

        return abi.encodeWithSelector(UINT256_BINOP_ERROR_SELECTOR, errorCode, a, b);
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'LibSafeMathRichErrors.Uint256BinOpError' (MintableERC20Token.sol#69-71) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'LibSafeMathRichErrors.Uint256DowncastError' (MintableERC20Token.sol#73-75) is not in mixedCase
